column4: i have a question, how can i identify if ubuntu is using my cdrom/dvdrom in terminal?
What do you mean "using" your cd/dvd rom?
uhmmm ill rephrase it, how do i identify my cdrom in ubuntu?
Identify what type it is, or what device it is mapped to? Usually, whatever device it is, it is accessible via /dev/cdrom
i meant uhmmm identify what cdrom name it is or other informations
A little bit of information can be found via dmesg, but I'm not sure where else you can find anything...
